name: THE CASTLE (itch) (krushl)
description:
Plot 

 The main action takes place around an island in the middle of the ocean. 

 There is a castle on the island with a small settlement near it. It all starts with the arrival of the main character on this island. 

 Having learned from the locals that the king owns mountains of gold, the main character is filled with envy and a desire to get it.

 The main goal of the hero sees to find the entrance to the castle.

authors animations - Ysonae
models -Lyrist 
code - krushl
enviroment artist - cyber__toad controls wasd - move
space - jump
shift - roll
3 - take out  weapon in the right hand
4 - take out  weapon in the left hand
left button mouse - light attack
right button mouse - hard attack
